alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 12 at 9:38AM MST until December 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. In Kansas, Cheyenne, Sherman, Wallace and Greeley Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
